title: Kanagawa, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

R marg ULQ; upper center
description: end of daimyo procession walking along street at R; two women attempt to pull members into their businesses; line of buildings along seaside; row of moored boats with white sails at far L; large ship at LL; smaller vessels along bay at L
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
